attributes.action: Reverse Kwarteng’s full fiscal policy of tax cuts
attributes.additional_details:
1 For the immediate reverse of currently plans for tax cuts and
2 A review of proposals which involves full Office for Budget Responsibility (OBR) forecasting including
3 Consideration of a House of Commons vote on reviewed proposals.
attributes.background: This petition is to ask Liz Truss’s cabinet to reverse their tax cutting policies which are leading to a significant downturn in the UKs economic outlook, the value of the pound, and the impact on the population through increased inflation.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Scrap the mini-budget and ensure independent review of any replacement package: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623684

Reverse the tax cuts announced in the mini budget: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623929
